articles.author: Agence France-Presse
articles.title: We are going to have a 'Come to Jesus' meeting, Joe Biden tells Netanyahu - India Today
articles.description: The American expression used by Joe Biden refers to a dramatic realisation that one must correct the course
articles.content: With Gaza's humanitarian crisis growing more dire and his left flank in uproar, President Joe Biden is increasingly showing impatience with Israel's leader and making clear the United States will act… [+4096 chars]
